title: Call for reforms

title: Reform UK surge in bombshell poll as gap closes with Tories on brink of landslide defeat
description: Reform UK has narrowed the gap with the Conservatives in a bombshell new poll, that saw the Tories sink to new lows in the latest voting intention poll. The latest YouGov/Times poll shows the Tories on 20 percent, a four percentage point drop from the last poll on February 14-15.
